EmailTemplate.name: RS Email 1 With Price
EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations! You've been named one of {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Market_City__c}'s Rising Stars in Real Estate
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Opportunity.ACDF_Fname__c},
Congratulations! You have been chosen as one of {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Market_City__c}'s 2016 Rising Star award winners! You will be featured in the {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Month__c} issue of {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Magazine__c}.
You are part of a select group of up-and-coming real estate agents in {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Market_City__c} that embody professional excellence and excel in client satisfaction. I want to help you use that powerful differentiation to your advantage!
I will be reaching out to you within the next few days, but in the meantime please feel free to request an appointment or view the award guide. Thank you,
{!Opportunity.OwnerFullName} Account Manager
Five Star Professional
{!Opportunity.OwnerPhone} {!Opportunity.OwnerEmail} www.fivestarprofessional.com
